articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Guest
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Guest 
    Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China who is also alternate member of the Central Committee of the CPC.
 Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department, handed it to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Jan. 17.

articles.title: Surprise Raid on GNP in S. Korea
articles.content:
Surprise Raid on GNP in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Students affiliated with the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils staged a surprise raid on the building of the Grand National Party of south Korea in Youido, Seoul, on Jan. 15, according to a press report.
 Choe Hang Sop, a student of Kangwon University, and other students occupied the press room of the building and wrote the letters "money party" on the emblem of the GNP, shouting in anger "Dissolve the GNP".    
 The GNP greatly alarmed called police to walk away the students.

Japanese Chief Executive's Claim to Tok Islet Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Chief Executive's Claim to Tok Islet Denounced in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The Tok Islet Fellowship Society held a rally in front of Thapgol Park, Seoul on Jan. 12 denouncing the Japanese chief executive's claim to Tok Islet, according to south Korean KBS.
 Branding Japan's assertion that "Tok Islet belongs to Japan" and its disturbance of south Korea's publication of stamps carrying the islet as a challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the Korean nation, the society demanded the authorities strongly react against this.    
 After the rally, the society conveyed a letter of protest to the Japanese embassy.

Choe Thae Bok Meets Vietnamese Ambassador
    Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Do Thi Hoa who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
